creditline: Gift of James D. Burke in honor of Dr. John and Colles Larkin
description: portrait of a girl with an oval face and long nose, wearing a green cap with a white knotted element on the PL front; high white scalloped collar; green dickey; purple blouse; mottled green background
inscription: on back at LRC: III / I / O / M
provenance: James D. Burke, Portland, Ore.; given to MIA, 2017.
signed: LLC in pencil: Girl in a Green Cap | LRC in pencil: A. Ryan
title: Girl in a Green Cap
